hero.question: Will Bitcoin dip to $45,000 by December 31, 2026?
hero.prob_take: Bears just got crushed 10 points in 24 hours, suggesting big money is stepping in to defend the 45K floor or the market finally priced in how hard it is to get BTC down 55% in 12 months. At 48%, you're basically getting even odds on a near-50% crash from here, which means the market is either terrified of a 2025 recession or sleeping on how much institutional buying props up downside.

daily_take.headline: Bitcoin's $45K Floor Bet Just Got Cheaper. Smart Money's Rotating Out.
daily_take.deck: Bitcoin dip-to-$45K odds collapsed 10 points to 48% overnight on $1.5M volume. The market's repricing two years of volatility into a coin flip, which means either we're seeing genuine conviction that BTC stays above that level, or weak hands dumping hedges. The play: if you think Bitcoin touches $45K between now and New Year's 2026, you're getting near fair value. If you think it doesn't, you're laying a bet that assumes no serious bear case lands in the next 24 months. That's the real alpha here.

sidebar.headline: Somalia strikes market is pricing certainty the US can't offer. 96% odds on 10-13 strikes in February alone looks like an overcommitment to a specific operational tempo.
sidebar.label: US-Somalia Strikes (Feb 2026): 96.0%

sidebar.headline: Liquid favored at 58.5%, but +10.5 point move on a BO3 smells like sharp action into the match. Watch pregame roster changes.
sidebar.label: Liquid vs Passion UA: 58.5%

sidebar.headline: Anduril IPO just took a 22 point hit. Market's pricing longer runway or shifting views on defense spending momentum. The 28% floor suggests skeptics still see runway.
